Title: Israel tests coronavirus vaccine prototype on rodents at defence lab - India Today
Description: A source familiar with IIBR activities told Reuters that trials were already under way on rodents. The source declined to identify the kind of rodent.

Title: Prominent Indian-origin virologist in South Africa dies from coronavirus - Hindustan Times
Description: Gita Ramjee, 64, was the Clinical Trials Unit Principal Investigator and Unit Director of the HIV Prevention Research Unit of the South African Medical Research Council (SAMRC) offices in Durban.

Title: 22-year old shares her experience as coronavirus survivor, says 'You do NOT want to catch this' - International Business Times, India Edition
Description: Amy tries to give a very detailed picture of her journey on contracting the virus by giving a detailed account of her nearly two weeks survival measures.

Title: Coronavirus necessitates global increase in protective equipment, medical supplies: UN health chief - indiablooms

Title: Paper-based test to detect coronavirus in wastewater: Study - The Indian Express
Description: Citing recent studies, they said live samples of the novel coronavirus, SARS-CoV-2, can be isolated from the faeces and urine of infected people, in which the pathogen can survive for up to several days after exiting the human body.
